document_data.name: Banish Flame
document_data.mainbody: '''''Banish flame''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Kossuth]], enabling them to extinguish flames.
document_data.Effects: This spell enabled the caster to extinguish nonmagical fires. Magical fires of a continuous nature would relight after a minute. The intensity of any flame-based breath weapons used in this spell's area of effect were slightly lessened depending on the skill of the caster.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
